ygData.subject: RE: Fw: I have quit Everquest
ygData.msgSnippet: Handling the top 3 highest is no big deal la.  Must also see the quality of the way u handle, hehe. Eg1: Customer: Hello, I would like to know how to apply
ygData.messageBody:
Handling the top 3 highest is no big deal la. Must also see the 'quality'
of the way u handle, hehe.

Eg1:
Customer: Hello, I would like to know how to apply for blah blah blah...
Garren: Memebership? Wah lan, send a tell to the guildmaster la....(*&@#$

Eg2:
Customer: I read from you home page and wonder where can I buy this item
blah blah blah..
Garren: Wah kow, put a msg in eBay la, or shout over the zone. If you pay
big money sure can buy one. Dun have money spend some time power lvling
and camp for it la, stupid!

Eg3:
Customer: I lose my account password.....
Customer: F*** la, I just die, I am binded at FP and my corpse in CT. Knn
I have to run so far...what you lose? I lose my full rubi armor, jboots,
ghoulbane etc...let me get my corpse first then help you to seek what you
lose la *hang up phone*

etc
etc..

See? Hahahahah ;P

Ziltus

On Wednesday, 27 October, 1999 4:44 PM, Gary Qui Hong Loong
[SMTP:kanglun@...] wrote:
> From: "Gary Qui Hong Loong" <kanglun@...>
>
> heheh, my numbers of calls handled is about the top 3 in the whole of
> the call centre even when I was playing EQ. hahah.
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Sereph <garford@...>
> To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> Sent: Wednesday, October 27, 1999 16:14
> Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Fw: I have quit Everquest
>
>
> > From: Sereph <garford@...>
> >
> > Forget the most importan thing, good luck with your damn job now that
you
> are not

folds!
> >
> > Sereph wrote:
> >
> > > From: Sereph <garford@...>
> > >
> > > Don't you think this is a bit rashed? I chao chao also have endure EQ
> for nearly
> > > 2 years now and stil manage to tahan the camping etc..... by NOT
camping
> for
> > > items unless friends are camping or if soloing for XP, spam guildsay
or
> talk
> > > cock with other people.
> > >
> > > They way with EQ is as you say level level level then at 50 camp
items
> blah blah
> > > blah, but you can do other things like run around the various karana
> plains and
> > > admire the sight or enter a low level dungeon and help newbies
survive,
> else if
> > > you everday camp item also can go gila.
> > >
> > > You can also do the long boring quest that eq has, heck, if you want
to
> kill
> > > Lucan, just send a tell and I help take 1 HT from him before
dying......
> > >
> > > Else do the most common thing people do when they are sick of EQ,
> restart! This
> > > time around, go more slowly, wait for kakis to join up, play a
diferent
> class,
> > > go to other hunting grounds you have never hunt in before. This will
> make it
> > > slightly more enjoyable and is a good chance to meet up with new
people.
> > >
> > > The over level 30 population in Inno is now at at all time low with
you
> > > leaving....... Once either Zan, FF or Merns leave, I better pack up
and
> zhao as
> > > well.....
> > >
> > > Bottomline, get your arse back into EQ and slave with the rest of
> us........ and
> > > if you do return, don't play for so long, play for shorter periods
and
> forcus
> > > more of fun and interaction.
> > >
> > > Fesse Estasis, Cleric who is working on her KOS faction.
> > >
> > > Gary Qui Hong Loong wrote:
> > >
> > > > From: "Gary Qui Hong Loong" <kanglun@...>
> > > >
> > > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > > From: Gary Qui Hong Loong <kanglun@...>
> > > > To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> > > > Sent: Tuesday, October 26, 1999 17:26
> > > > Subject: I have quit Everquest
> > > >
> > > > > Hi all,
> > > > > Dued to my failure at PoF which got alot of ppl into
trouble
> > > > (which
> > > > > involved dying and losing the major portion of their stuff) and
with
> > > > little
> > > > > else to do (except like camping for stuff, which I have gotten
very
> sick
> > > > and
> > > > > tired of), I have cancelled my account as from today, Oct 26th
1999.
> Zand,
> > > > > please give out the items to the people as I have listed down
with
> you.
> > > > > Especially Weadaenye, whom I'm guilty as hell to got her into a
> living
> > > > hell.
> > > > >
> > > > > Please help me tell the follow people of my quiting and
hope
> to
> > > > see
> > > > > them again sometime on another game another time and Best wishes
to
> them.
> > > > >
> > > > > Daedor, Aildiin, Iyenya, Ironbuket, Hoppy, Kitiarra,
Stella,
> > > > > Saintly, Valadine, Millie, Silph, Lunatictiara, Ader, Fost,
Sparrow,
> > > > > Demitry, Wlyven, Anima and Nismo/Volk (they are brothers sharing
the
> same
> > > > > account).
> > > > >
> > > > > Everquest was, had been and enjoyable game at the
beginning
> but
> > > > due
> > > > > to the way that the game is designed it reminds me more of
Evercamp,
> > > > > Everbitch etc etc. It has become a torture to enter the "game"
each
> day
> > > > now.
> > > > > This incident has at least freed me from Evercrack as some would
say
> it
> > > > is.
> > > > > So farewell my fellow guildmates. And may your time in Everquest
be
> as
> > > > your
> > > > > first day, with new and exciting adventures each day.
> > > > >
> > > > > Garren The Broken Paladin.
> > > > >
